title: British and Irish Poetry: 1900 to Present
description: Selected topics in British and Irish poetry in the twentieth and twenty-first centuries. Topics may include modernism, movement poetry, the British poetry revival, and postcolonial and Black British poetry. Program or materials fees may apply. LTEN 128GS and LTEN 128 may be taken for credit for a combined total of three times. Prerequisites: students must apply and be accepted to the Global Seminars Program.
